title: Keep Them Warm Indoors
text: Make sure your pets have a cozy bed and blanket to stay warm during cold nights.

title: Avoid Frequent Baths
text: Frequent baths can remove natural oils from your pet’s skin, making it dry and flaky.

title: Feed Nutritious Food
text: Give your pets extra nutrition during winter to help maintain their energy levels.

title: Show Extra Love & Care
text: Pets can get lazy during winter — spend more time playing with them to keep them active.
